message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on person re-identification in video surveillance systems, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses deep learning techniques for feature extraction, which falls under cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of updating rules and mean-shift tracking method suggests the involvement of machine learning and optimization, which could be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper deals with image matching and retrieval, which could be classified under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
